messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: I'm speaking in Las Vegas
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/10/2004 11:11:37 PM Mountain Daylight Time, conniecolten@aol.com writes: I m so excited that I ll get to meet you in person, Sandra!
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/10/2004 11:11:37 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
conniecolten@... writes:
I'm so excited that I'll get to meet you in person, Sandra! Trevor and I
will be driving over to the conference. I'm unaware of the gathering on
Sunday.
========

Turns out now it will be Monday, because of Father's Day. If it turns out
you'll still be in the area, or passing back through... well you can talk to
some of them when we're there, becausethe plan's not firmly set.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: I'm speaking in Las Vegas
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/10/04 11:55:30 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... I m so excited that I ll get to meet you in person, Sandra!  Trevor and I will be driving
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/10/04 11:55:30 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> http://www.nevadahomeschoolnetwork.com/convention.html
>
> 2nd Annual Nevada Homeschool Network Convention
> June 18 and 19, 2004
> Calvary Community, 2900 N. Torrey Pines Dr.
>
> Not an unschooling conference, a variety show of homeschooling topics. The
> way it's set up (seems to be) is that each particular homeschooling group
> there
> is sponsoring a speaker. I'm sponsored by Las Vegas Life Learners, a new
> unschooling group there. http://groups.yahoo.com/group/LVLifelearners/
>
> Other people I know to be on the unschooling side of life are Connie Colten;
> and Elissa Wahl who's one of the authors of Christian unschooling; and
> Steve and Kimberly Patrow who used to live in Albuquerque and were active in
> The Goof Group, a weekly unschooling group we used to have here when Kirby
> and
> Marty were younger.
>
>

I'm so excited that I'll get to meet you in person, Sandra! Trevor and I
will be driving over to the conference. I'm unaware of the gathering on Sunday.
T and I plan to drive over to take a look at the G. Canyon, so don't know
what time we'll need to leave on Sunday to get where we need to be ---

Looking forward to seeing you --- and being at the conference.

Connie
www.homeschoolingreflections.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
